text: Thakurartha Devadithya Guardiyawasam Lindamulage Nalin Kumara de Silva is a Sri Lankan philosopher and a political analyst. He is the former Sri Lankan ambassador in Myanmar.https://divaina.com/sunday/index.php/visheshanga1/14020-2020-05-09-13-00-69 De Silva died on 2 May 2024 in Fremont, California at the age of 79. == References == Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Sri Lankan scientists Category:Sri Lankan Buddhists Category:Philosophers
